meanings.definition: The act of mutualizing or making mutual.
meanings.sent1: The mutualizations of the company led to better cooperation among employees.
meanings.sent2: The mutualizations of the community resulted in shared responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The mutualizations of the school club made everyone feel like a big family.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a mutualizations that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The mutualizations of the garden created a beautiful harmony among the flowers.

meanings.definition: The process of converting something into a mutual organization.
meanings.sent1: The mutualizations of the business transformed it into a cooperative.
meanings.sent2: The mutualizations of the association brought about equal ownership.
meanings.sent3: The mutualizations of the team turned them into a united force.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership was a mutualizations that unified the group.
meanings.sent5: The mutualizations of the project turned it into a joint effort.

meanings.definition: The state of being mutualized or mutual.
meanings.sent1: The mutualizations of the relationship created a strong bond.
meanings.sent2: The mutualizations of the partnership ensured fairness for all.
meanings.sent3: The mutualizations of the friendship made them inseparable.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was a mutualizations that touched everyone's heart.
meanings.sent5: The mutualizations of the agreement brought peace to both parties.
